deliberativeLayer

Class DecisionNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • deliberativeLayer.DecisionNetwork

  • public class DecisionNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure used to contain genes/weights with a static structure and size. 
     Output: (action: Resource, Stone, Water) 
 
     R   S   W
 
   x   x   x   x
 
  g  r  s  w  c  b
 
 Input: (status of animat: on grass, resource, stone, water, carrying status, bridgeBeenBuilt)
 
 
 
 weights1: 
 
 h        input
 i { [ x x x x x x ],
 d   [ x x x x x x ],
 d   [ x x x x x x ],
 e   [ x x x x x x ]  }  each row is the incoming connections from the previous layer
 n
 
 
 weights2:
 
       hidden
 o { [ x x x x ],
 u   [ x x x x ],
 t   [ x x x x ]  }  each row is the incoming connections from the previous layer
    Version:
    v1.2
    Author:
    Chloe M. Barnes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double CROSSOVER_RATE
      The rate in which the DecisionNetwork will crossover between parents at each generation; otherwise inherits from one parent.
      private double[] expectedOutputData
      The expected output data used to compare actual results to expected results (only used for testing).
      private static int hiddenLayerSize
      The number units in the hidden layer for the DecisionNetwork.
      private double[] inputData
      The input data to initialise the DecisionNetwork (only used for testing).
      private static int inputLayerSize
      The number of inputs for the DecisionNetwork.
      private static double MUTATION_RATE
      The rate in which the DecisionNetwork weights will mutate at each generation.
      private double[] outputData
      The generated output data.
      private static int outputLayerSize
      The number of outputs that the DecisionNetwork will generate.
      private double[][] weights1
      A double array containing the weights for the first layer of the DecisionNetwork.
      private double[][] weights2
      A double array containing the weights for the second layer of the DecisionNetwork.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecisionNetwork()
      Creates a new DecisionNetwork with the default inputLayerSize, hiddenLayerSize and outputLayerSize, with weights randomly initialised between -1 and 1.
      DecisionNetwork(double[][][] weights)
      Creates a new DecisionNetwork populated using given weights.

    • Field Detail

      • inputLayerSize

        private static int inputLayerSize
        The number of inputs for the DecisionNetwork.

      • hiddenLayerSize

        private static int hiddenLayerSize
        The number units in the hidden layer for the DecisionNetwork.

      • outputLayerSize

        private static int outputLayerSize
        The number of outputs that the DecisionNetwork will generate.

      • inputData

        private double[] inputData
        The input data to initialise the DecisionNetwork (only used for testing).

      • outputData

        private double[] outputData
        The generated output data.

      • expectedOutputData

        private double[] expectedOutputData
        The expected output data used to compare actual results to expected results (only used for testing).

      • weights1

        private double[][] weights1

        A double array containing the weights for the first layer of the DecisionNetwork.

        The number of rows equals the number of hidden units, and the columns equals the number of inputs.

        double[hiddenUnits][inputs]

      • weights2

        private double[][] weights2

        A double array containing the weights for the second layer of the DecisionNetwork.

        The number of rows equals the number of outputs, and the columns equals the number of hidden units.

        double[outputs][hiddenUnits]

      • MUTATION_RATE

        private static final double MUTATION_RATE
        The rate in which the DecisionNetwork weights will mutate at each generation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CROSSOVER_RATE

        private static final double CROSSOVER_RATE
        The rate in which the DecisionNetwork will crossover between parents at each generation; otherwise inherits from one parent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecisionNetwork

        public DecisionNetwork()
        Creates a new DecisionNetwork with the default inputLayerSize, hiddenLayerSize and outputLayerSize, with weights randomly initialised between -1 and 1.

      • DecisionNetwork

        public DecisionNetwork(double[][][] weights)

        Creates a new DecisionNetwork populated using given weights.

        double[][rows][cols],

        where double[0] contains weights1 and double[1] weights2.

        Parameters:
        weights - A 3D array containing the weights in which to populate the new DecisionNetwork.

    • Method Detail

      • createOffspring

        public double[][][] createOffspring(double[][][] other)

        Creates the weights for a new offspring with the current DecisionNetwork as one parent, and the weights passed in as another parent.

        double[][rows][cols],

        where double[0] contains weights1 and double[1] weights2.

        Parameters:
        other - The weights of the other parent DecisionNetwork.
        Returns:
        The new weights of an offspring generated from both parents.

      • getGenes

        public double[][][] getGenes()

        Returns the genes of the DecisionNetwork in the format of a 3D array.

        double[][rows][cols],

        where double[0] contains weights1 and double[1] weights2.

        Returns:
        A 3D array containing the weights of the DecisionNetwork.

      • setGenes

        public void setGenes(double[][][] genes)

        Sets the weights that a DecisionNetwork contains for both layers.

        Genes are passed in through a 3D array in the format double[][rows][cols],

        where double[0] contains weights1 and double[1] weights2.

        Parameters:
        genes - A 3D array containing the weights that the DecisionNetwork will use.

      • getOutput

        public double[] getOutput()
        Returns a double array of the values the DecisionNetwork generated in the last run.
        Returns:
        A double array containing the output values.

      • forward

        public double[] forward(double[] input)
        Generates output values by performing forward propagation based on the given input values, using the hyperbolicTangent(double[][]) activation function.
        Parameters:
        input - A double array containing the input values for the calculations.
        Returns:
        A double array containing the output values, based on the input values, after forward propagation through the DecisionNetwork.

      • sigmoid

        private double[][] sigmoid(double[][] matrix)
        Applies the sigmoid function to the given input matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to apply the sigmoid function to.
        Returns:
        The processed input with the sigmoid function applied.

      • hyperbolicTangent

        public double[][] hyperbolicTangent(double[][] matrix)
        Applies the hyperbolic tangent function to the given input matrix. The matrix will be processed as follows:
        • a value below 0.35 will be set as -1
        • a value above 0.65 will be set as 1
        • all other values will be set as 0
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to apply the hyperbolic tangent function to.
        Returns:
        The processed input with the hyperbolic tangent function applied.

      • getInputSize

        public int getInputSize()
        Returns the number of neurons in the input layer.
        Returns:
        inputLayerSize

      • getOutputSize

        public int getOutputSize()
        Returns the number of neurons in the output layer.
        Returns:
        outputLayerSize

      • matrixMult

        private double[][] matrixMult(double[][] first,
                              double[][] second)
        Performs matrix multiplication between the input matrices and returns the resulting matrix.
        Parameters:
        first - The first matrix operand.
        second - The second matrix operand.
        Returns:
        A matrix resulting from multiplying the first by the second matrix.

      • randomiseWeights

        private double[][] randomiseWeights(double[][] matrix,
                                    boolean randomise)
        Generates random weights for all layers in the DecisionNetwork, or fills the weights with zeros if randomise is false.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to populate.
        randomise - Randomises weight values between -1 and 1 if true, zeros if false
        Returns:
        The resulting, populated matrix.

      • getCommonGenes

        public static double[][][] getCommonGenes(java.util.ArrayList<double[][][]> genes)
        Calculates and returns a representative state of a collection of DecisionNetworks to simulate tradition. The median value for each weight in each DecisionNetwork in the collection is calculated, resulting in a single set of weights that reflect the current state of the collection. This assumes that calculating the median weights is a sufficient way to simulate tradition.
        Parameters:
        genes - A collection of many DecisionNetwork weights, in which to find a representative/traditional state.
        Returns:
        A single set of weights in a 3D array, which are a representative/traditional state correlating to the collective population.
